EmitterName: The name of the emitter to use that the source location for particle.
SelectionMethod:
The method to use when selecting a spawn target particle from the emitter.
Can be one of the following:
        ELESM_Random            Randomly select a particle from the source emitter.
        ELESM_Sequential        Step through each particle from the source emitter in order.
InheritSourceVelocityScale: Amount to scale the source velocity by when inheriting it.
InheritSourceRotationScale: Amount to scale the source rotation by when inheriting it.
InheritSourceVelocity: If true, the spawned particle should inherit the velocity of the source particle.
bInheritSourceRotation: If true, the spawned particle should inherit the rotation of the source particle.
